conferenceOverview: Welcome to the official website of the 2021 Canadian Undergraduate Mathematics Conference (CUMC)! The CUMC is a Canada-wide conference aimed at undergraduate students in the mathematical sciences. This year's CUMC will be hosted by Western University from August 19-22. This website is the main source of information regarding the conference. Check back regularly for updates!
conferenceDetails: The organizing committee for the conference hopes to hold it in-person. If public health measures prevent this, there are plans in place to run the conference virtually. We appreciate your patience as we await any changes to health regulations.
conferenceBooklet: The conference book, once available, will be found here.
